hero.question: Do you already have a generator?
hero.subtitle: MyGensSizing helps you find the right generator for your home or business with our professional sizing tool.
hero.noGenerator: I do not have a generator yet
hero.noGeneratorDesc: Use our sizing tool to find the perfect generator for your needs.
hero.hasGeneratorDesc: Get support, maintenance tips, or validation for your current setup.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: MyGensSizing provides a professional sizing and support workflow directly from the web.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Tell us about your property and electrical needs through our intuitive wizard.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Share photos of nameplates, breakers, and motors for accurate sizing.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Our algorithm calculates the perfect generator size for your requirements.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Get a ZIP with full technical summary, ready for review or approval.

supportSection.title: Support
supportSection.description: Need help with an existing generator, missing data, or validation? Our team reviews your sizing package and assists you directly.

sizingTool.title: Generator Sizing Tool
sizingTool.visualDesc: Guided visual approach — ideal for residential and light industrial projects.
sizingTool.engineeringDesc: Original engineering tool — for technical professionals and complex setups.
sizingTool.residentialDesc: Based on rooms and typical household loads.
sizingTool.industrialDesc: Based on running loads and motor starting requirements.

industrial.title: Industrial inputs
industrial.desc: Simple model: running load + worst single motor start.

supportPage.title: Contact Support
supportPage.subtitle: Need help? Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you.
